content: I just wanted to get some opinions on investing in Iraqi dinar. I sold all my dinar last year when there was talk of lopping off some zeros, then there was the rumor that they were going to create an entirely new currency. Now it seems that the economy is doing well and there is speculation of a revalue of the dinar.

title: Dinar investment
